editorialNotes.standard: Solve puzzles, inspect chilling notes and videos, and outrun a nightmarish smiling cat in the third chapter of this freaky horror series.

ios.subtitle: More A Little to the Left!
The moving story of a lifetime

editorialNotes.standard: Movingâ€™s a drag! Relocate to this satisfying puzzler in which you unpack boxes filled with all sorts of goodies.

ios.subtitle: Trickier A Little to the Left

editorialNotes.standard: When dinosaurs collide with LEGO bricks, you donâ€™t have to be Mr. DNA to know the result is pure fun. Starring characters and creatures from all four Jurassic Park movies, this fantastic adventure lets you relive your favorite moments from the series and even create new ones with your own custom dinos. Full of all the humor, action, and surprises you expect, itâ€™s a wacky team-up of T-Rex proportions.

Years after its debut, The Room remains one of the most absorbing puzzlers weâ€™ve played. Use ingenuity and intuitive controls to manipulate a series of nested boxes and unlock the secret inside. As each thrown switch and decrypted code reveals another intricate enigma, breathtaking sights and eerie sounds weave an irresistible atmosphere of suspense. All the more amazing for being the debut effort from Fireproof Games, The Room beautifully blurs the line between entertainment and artistry.

After a long day at work, itâ€™s bath time! But Swampyâ€™s shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.Â
Enigmatic settings and storytelling enrich the mysteries of Leonardo da Vinci's gadgetry in this escape room puzzle seriesâ€™ fantastic conclusion.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Put a little â€œbooâ€ in your botany by concocting herbal remedies for odd supernatural ailments in this eerie puzzle-adventure.

Now hereâ€™s how you build a sequel! With The Room Three, Fireproof Games kept everything we love about this seriesâ€”its chilling atmosphere, mind-bending puzzles, and beautiful visualsâ€”while making masterful enhancements. Itâ€™s no wonder itâ€™s an Honorable Mention for Best Mobile Game at this yearâ€™s Game Developers Conference. The story continues with trials set by a creepy new nemesis, The Craftsman. As you explore huge areas and tiny ones, the challenges feel increasingly epic, and a better-than-ever hint system ensures that finding solutions is super-rewarding.
editorialNotes.short: Brilliant puzzle designs and a haunting atmosphere make this unforgettable.

ios.subtitle: A story of beauty and illusion

editorialNotes.standard: We couldnâ€™t wait to go back to the land of twisty towers and uncanny beautyâ€”and this sequel didnâ€™t let us down. With its striking colors and level design, itâ€™s even more stunning than the first game. New elements like light beams and controlling two characters make the puzzles even trickier. The bond between that mother and child is what weâ€™ll remember most, thoughâ€”their relationship moved us in a way few games do.
editorialNotes.short: A powerful bond between mother and child drives this gorgeous, unforgettable game.

editorialNotes.standard: Imagination becomes reality in 5th Cellâ€™s spectacular puzzlerâ€”just write the name of almost anything in a magical notebook, and it appears before you. Expanding on the more linear Scribblenauts Remix, this game turns you loose to explore an open world. By creating everything from flying pigs to rocket launchers, you solve problems big and small for the people you meet. As the freedom to roam met the freedom to create, we got lost in coming up with the zaniest, most outlandish, or sometimes most diabolical ways to solve each scenario.

A terrific follow-up to our 2012 iPad Game of the Year, The Room Two continues the dark, foreboding tale introduced in its predecessor. Marvelously detailed graphics and eerie music make this first-person puzzler feel stunningly real, and as you travel from an ancient crypt to a sÃ©ance room and beyond, youâ€™ll love unlocking the secrets of every objectâ€”and learning more about your mysterious imprisonment.

editorialNotes.tagline: Jump in and save the ninjas!
editorialNotes.standard: Goofy banter, diverting puzzles, wall-to-wall actionâ€”we couldnâ€™t ask for more from a LEGO Ninjago game. Using the warriorsâ€™ trademark weapons and elemental moves, youâ€™ll battle the nefarious Ronin and his crew across Chenâ€™s Island, the Toxic Bogs, and other familiar settings. Even if youâ€™ve never seen the Masters of Spinjitzu animated series, these hilarious heroes and their kid-friendly shenanigans are guaranteed to win you over.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The enchantingly eccentric Rusty Lake series heads underground! Solve strange puzzles in train stations representing different eras of a womanâ€™s life.

name: Smart Baby Shapes: Learning games for toddler kids

editorialNotes.standard: You might get stuck the first time you play Gorogoa. But once the gears of your brain settle into the right configurations, youâ€™ll see how smart this mix of art and perspective really is. Layers pile upon layers, doors transport you between realities, strange creatures and wild environments blend together into a fascinating interactive collage youâ€™ll want to peel apart to discover what lies underneath.

editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Come for the satisfaction of solving mysteries; stay for this unforgettable adventureâ€™s lovable characters and excellent writing.

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two

editorialNotes.tagline: This party game is the bomb!

editorialNotes.short: Unravel family secrets on a remote island cursed by plagues in this dark puzzle adventure.

editorialNotes.standard: In Baba Is Youâ€™s brilliant puzzles, rules are meant to be brokenâ€”or at least rewritten. Brick wall standing between you and the victory flag? Shift blocks of text to form phrases that change the way the world works. With a few moves, â€œwall is stopâ€ becomes â€œwall is pushâ€â€”and success is suddenly within your grasp. Youâ€™ll marvel as the game responds instantly to your newly created laws. Spell yourself into a corner? Just rewind and retrace your steps. Baba is you, and youâ€™re in charge.

We love how Moncageâ€™s puzzles show the importance of seeing things from different perspectives. The storytelling vignettes packed into the faces of a rotating cube connect and combine in ever-evolving, surprising ways, and the challenge of making those connections sparks creativity and renders the impossible suddenly possible. Rarely has the concept of thinking outside the box been illustrated so well.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Like a jigsaw of your insides.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Imagine WALLÂ·E directed by Tim Burtonâ€”thatâ€™s the weird, wonderful world of Machinarium. But this cute robotâ€™s quest for love combines tons more influencesâ€”like point-and-click adventures, hidden-object puzzlers, and comic booksâ€”for a truly unique experience. Challenging but full of awesome â€œaha!â€ moments, itâ€™s an artistic odyssey that looks amazing on iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Donut County is an absolute treat. You drag holes across land to collect bigger and bigger aboveground objects, from puddles and fire pits to trees and boulders. New ideas change gameplay in intriguing ways, and concepts never overstay their welcome, making every puzzle feel new and interesting. The consequences of every hole you control propel a wonderfully quirky story about a suddenly subterranean society seeking a return to the surface. Along with the gameâ€™s fantastic visual style and marvelous soundtrack, its every idiosyncrasy miraculously blends into an inviting, cohesive whole.
editorialNotes.short: Geneva Hodgson: Story editor, Donut County

editorialNotes.standard: Cool features like asynchronous multiplayer uplift the mobile version of this hit tabletop word association game.

Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters, and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative, and an excellent touch-screen control system, itâ€™s as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

editorialNotes.standard: Mesmerizing from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, youâ€™ll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. Itâ€™s a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwoâ€™s adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Explore a gorgeous island packed with intricately interwoven puzzles. Thereâ€™s a subtle logic to the world design that connects structures, land configurations, and puzzle grids. For persistent adventurers, The Witness is an unforgettable experience.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: With surreal illustrations and fruit-headed characters, this point-and-click adventure is as strange as it is clever.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Tug, twist, and bend orbits to reach harmonic chimes in this meditative musical puzzler.

name: Lightbot Jr : Coding Puzzles for Ages 4+

editorialNotes.standard: Weâ€™ll never forget ascending a mysterious tower with the help of a pet-like friend in this wordless point-and-click adventure about cooperation and personal purpose.
Search for a missing dog through lavishly illustrated cityscapes in this relaxing adventure game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Looking for good vibes? This heartwarming puzzler delivers again and again as you help a hen rescue her chicks.
With relaxed swapping rules and charming graphics, this surprisingly slick match-3 puzzler makes the genre feel fresh again.

If you can doodle, you can play this one-of-a-kind Apple Design Award winner. Just draw a lineâ€”any lineâ€”and watch it spring to life across the screen, following your gestures to collect colored dots and avoid black holes. But as the holes form increasingly elaborate obstacles, only the most ingenious doodles will do. With endless solutions to every challenge, itâ€™s a stylish, supremely satisfying test of your creativity and puzzle-solving prowess.
Put a little sci-fi mystery in your history by unlocking the secrets of computing pioneer Ada Lovelace in this cerebral adventure.

name: Smart Baby ABC Games: Toddler Kids Learning Apps

editorialNotes.short: An immersive world filled with ancient ruins and advanced technology.

editorialNotes.standard: In this stunningly original game, you play as a spherical being in a crowded primordial soup, absorbing smaller creatures to grow and avoiding larger ones to survive. Tap to jet across the screen and pursue your prey, but beware: moving reduces your size, making every attack a calculated risk. Osmos delivers a mesmerizing mix of abstract action and physics-based puzzles, with luminescent visuals and an ambient soundtrack that immerse you in another world.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: When young astronaut Kosmo sees his robot girlfriend, Nova, blown to pieces before his eyes, he gallantly sets off across the galaxy to find his belovedâ€™s parts and put her back together. This beautiful and whimsical point-and-click adventure will steal your heart as you visit dozens of kooky planets and encounter everything from alien arcades to robot discos. Each unique world introduces adorable critters, fantastic sights, clever puzzles to solve, and tokens of affection to discover. Star-crossed romance has never felt so rewarding.

In this stunningly original game, you play as a spherical being in a crowded primordial soup, absorbing smaller creatures to grow and avoiding larger ones to survive. Tap to jet across the screen and pursue your prey, but beware: moving reduces your size, making every attack a calculated risk. Osmos delivers a mesmerizing mix of abstract action and physics-based puzzles, with luminescent visuals and an ambient soundtrack that immerse you in another world.

They say donâ€™t wake sleeping dogs, but poor Mimpi has been having some very weird dreams. From laboratories to forests to dangerous, debris-strewn waters, the only similarity between Mimpiâ€™s dreamscapes is how fun they are to navigate. Each stage is filled with puzzles to solve and environmental objects to fiddle with. Youâ€™ll knock down power lines, steer clouds, push suitcases, and (of course!) collect bones on your exhilarating journey through dreamlands.
